set.name: DMBD-12 Gachi Yaba 4! Infinite Modifier Deck Set DX!! Zeero's Dragon Aura

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Race
property.value: Dragon Code/Dolszak/Mafi Gang/Deletron

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". (A creatures that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ Infinite Sin of Sin Moonless Night: At the start of your turn, if this is in your graveyard, you may destroy 2 of your creatures. If you do, put this aura into the battle zone. ■ When you attach this to a creature, choose an aura that costs 7 or less from your graveyard and attach it to that creature. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-12 Gachi Yaba 4! Infinite Modifier Deck Set DX!! Zeero's Dragon Aura

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this aura is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you attach this to a creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-12 Gachi Yaba 4! Infinite Modifier Deck Set DX!! Zeero's Dragon Aura

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you attach this to a creature, draw 3 cards, then discard 2 cards from your hand. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-12 Gachi Yaba 4! Infinite Modifier Deck Set DX!! Zeero's Dragon Aura

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang/Deletron

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 5 (Darkness): When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 5 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is darkness civilization, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-12 Gachi Yaba 4! Infinite Modifier Deck Set DX!! Zeero's Dragon Aura

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang/Deletron

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this aura is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) {GREAT SIN OF MOONLESS NIGHT} 2 (You may reduce the cost of using this aura by 2. If you do, destroy one of your creatures at the end of your turn.) ■ When you attach this to a creature, each of your opponent's creatures gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

If you do, destroy one of your creatures at the end of your turn.) ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". (A creatures that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ When you attach this to a creature, each player chooses and destroys one of their creatures. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this aura is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ The attached creature gets "blocker" and "slayer". (You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of one of your opponent's creatures to that creature.) (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the opponent's creature after the battle.) {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.
